name: Insight Investment Management (Europe) Limited, Insight Investment Management Limited
goal: Insight Investment is a leading European and global asset manager for institutional investors, particularly pension funds. Our investment management approach is focused on delivering solutions for our clients to provide greater certainty of financial outcome, and a large proportion of our assets is managed on behalf of pension funds in the form of liability risk management mandates, which positions us as one of the largest managers of European pension funds. We closely follow key financial market regulatory initiatives that would have an impact on our clients, and wish to positively engage in this process by providing a voice for European pension funds and other institutional clients.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives:
Key financial markets EU initiatives impacting our clients and funds:
EMIR (European Market Infrastructure Regulation), MiFIR (Markets in Financial Instruments Regulation), CRDIV (Capital Requirements Directive IV),
CRR I (Capital Requirements Regulation I),
CRDV (Capital Requirements Directive V),
CRR II (Capital Requirements Regulation II),
CMU (Capital Markets Union),
SFTR (The Securities Financing Transactions Regulation),
MMFs (Money Market Fund Regulations),
AIFMD (Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive),
UCITS (Undertakings for Collective Investments in Transferable Securities), and
FTT (Financial Transaction Tax)
MiFID II
EU Benchmark Regulation
EMIR 2.2, CCP Supervision
Green bonds
Sustainable finance
CSDR
Investment Frim Review
